title: Scrap, Tough Backs, HOFers from my collection now available
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Scrap, Tough Backs, HOFers from my collection now available
posts.post_content:
Hey Guys,

I need to sell a decent amount of stuff to pay for some recent purchases.  I won't need to sell anywhere near all of this stuff, but I'm willing to move these cards if we can make a deal.  

I know nobody like the "make an offer" BST posts.  I have a few cards here that are probably better suited to an auction setting, but I am throwing them up for offers just in case someone wants them enough to make a strong offer.  The scrap market can be all over the place, so I will listen to all offers.  If I get a few offers, I'll probably take a few days to decide what to do.  I will likely consult some knowledgeable friends about the offers, but I will not use your offer to try and get someone else to go higher.  I am motivated to sell, but this is certainly not a fire sale.

I can accept most payment types.  PP f/f is easiest for me, regular PP +3% is fine.  Checks and MO also fine.

Roughly in order of value:

Shaw Piedmont 350 PSA 5.5 $2,800 obo Probably the highest graded copy, but no way to be sure.  Also the most beautiful T206 I've ever owned.  Almost flawless.  (forgot to scan this one at first, so it is the first scan on the second page)

Hunter scrap $1050 obo  Hand-cut and missing color pass(es)

Krause scrap $900 obo  Hand-cut and missing color pass(es)

Leifield scrap $700 obo  Hand-cut but colors look normal

Chance yellow portrait Cycle 460 SGC 35 taking offers  Hard to figure out a price on this one.  A very nice SGC 40 went for $3,286 at auction last year.  I don't expect anywhere near that, but it makes it hard to put a value on mine.  [url]http://www.legendaryauctions.com/1909-11-t206-white-border-frank-chance,-portrait,-yellow-background,-rare-%22cycle-460%22-back---sgc-40--lot162100.aspx[/url]

Waddell Hindu portrait SGC 20 $750 obo

Donovan portrait EPDG PSA 5 $535 obo

Griffith Hindu SGC 20 $400 

Clarke batting Hindu A $335 obo (trimmed along the bottom, but very strong eye appeal)

Karger EPDG SGC 40  $300 obo

Waddell Sov150 SGC 40 $220

Waddell Sov350 SGC 35 $188

Hinchman semi-colon $75

Tough 150-350 series Old Mills

Waddell BVG 3 $265 obo

Chance red portrait PSA 2 $265 obo

Marquard hands at sides SGC 10 $90

Nicholls SGC 40 $100 obo

Goode PSA 2 $70

Donlin seated PSA 2 $80

Killian $55

HOFers:

Collins Huge Borders and backstamp $160  sold

Lajoie throwing tough SC 350/25 back $160

Luke,

:eek::eek: Sweet cards.  Luckily I don't collect backs :rolleyes:

BUT --- the P350 Shaw is "quite" nice :)
Wow, some great cards there Luke. Must have been some great purchases you made. Good luck with the sale!
I know it's a common back, but that Collins is probably my favorite. It's already a gorgeous card and with the jumbo borders and very clean front, it makes it incredibly cool.
Thanks for all the kind words guys.  I removed sold cards and dropped prices.  Also would consider trades (for the value of my ask price or close) for the scraps.
I see the ghost is gone that was a real beauty

I still have it.  Basically needed to sell around $2k worth of cards and was able to do that, so I pulled that one back.  I didn't expect anyone to pay $9k for it, and I didn't want to have to sell it anyway.
Glad you got to keep the ghost  Luke, such a great card!
